In 1992 Fredriksson returned to her solo career, recording the soul searching Den stÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¤ndiga resan. The album was her musical self-portrait and was written like a diary, containing very personal songs about her life, feelings and relationships. It mirrors a four to five year period of my life, said Marie about the album. It was a crisis, with hellish side effects. But I'm glad I went through it. The song Ett enda liv was written about a good friend of hers who committed suicide.  (wikipedia)
